title: Advisory: Press Avail During White House Office Of Urban Affairs And Domestic Policy Council Urban And Metropolitan Policy Roundtable | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




July 13, 2009

 



Advisory: Press Avail During White House Office Of Urban Affairs And Domestic Policy Council Urban And Metropolitan Policy Roundtable






THE WHITE HOUSE
		Office of the Press Secretary
		_________________________________________________
		FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                 July 13, 2009

ADVISORY: PRESS AVAIL DURING WHITE HOUSE OFFICE OF URBAN AFFAIRS AND DOMESTIC POLICY COUNCIL URBAN AND METROPOLITAN POLICY ROUNDTABLE

		WASHINGTON, DC - As part of the day long urban policy roundtable conducted by the White House Office of Urban Affairs and Domestic Policy Council, cabinet members and metropolitan association representatives contributing to the day’s discussion will be available at 1:45 p.m. at the West Wing stakeout area.  Adolfo Carrion, Director of the White House Office of Urban Affairs, will provide a summary of the policy discussion being conducted with leading experts from across the country, and time will be made for Q&A.

WHAT:
		Press avail during the White House Office of Urban Affairs Urban Policy Roundtable

WHO:
		Adolfo Carrion, Director, White House Office of Urban AffairsSec. Ray LaHood,  
		Department of Transportation
		Sec. Shaun Donovan, Department of Housing and Urban Development
		Administrator Lisa Jackson, Environmental Protection Agency
		Administrator Karen Mills, Small Business Administration
		Governor Edward Rendell of Pennsylvania, National Governors Association
		Mayor Greg Nickels of Seattle, president, U.S. Conference of Mayors
		Dekalb County Georgia CEO Burrell Ellis, chairman, Large Urban County Caucus, National Association of Counties
		Mayor Kathleen Novak of Northglenn, Colo., president, National League of Cities

WHEN:
		TODAY, Monday, July 13
		1:45PM EDT

WHERE:
		West Wing stakeout area

RSVP:
		Media wishing to RSVP should email media_affairs@who.eop.gov


		###
